content: designed on the shore of lake owen in the chequamegon national forest one chilly august day knit in bulky weight yarn with a garter stitch band this hat is very stretchy and can accommodate a large range of head sizes making it a good choice for charity knitting the texture makes it a good choice for hand painted or handspun yarns this is a bulky version of my the ridges hat /patterns/library/the-ridges-hat which is knit in worsted weight
